Sentencas: High ionic conductivity, varying from 0.01 to 1 S cm(-1) between 300 and 700 degreesC, has been achieved for the hybrid and nano-ceriacomposite electrolyte materials, demonstrating a successful application for advanced low temperature solid oxide fuel cells (LTSOFCs).
Titulo: Innovative low temperature SOFCs and advanced materials

Sentencas: The LTSOFCs were constructed based on these new materials.
Titulo: Innovative low temperature SOFCs and advanced materials

Sentencas: The performance of 0.15-0.25 W cm(-2) was obtained in temperature region of 320400 degreesC for the ceria-carbonate composite electrolyte, and of 0.35-0.66 W cm(-2) in temperature region of 500-600 degreesC for the ceria-lanthanum oxide composites.
Titulo: Innovative low temperature SOFCs and advanced materials

Sentencas: The cell could even function at as low as 200 degreesC. The cell has also undergone a life test for several months.
Titulo: Innovative low temperature SOFCs and advanced materials

Sentencas: A two-cell stack was studied, showing expected performance successfully.
Titulo: Innovative low temperature SOFCs and advanced materials

Sentencas: The excellent LTSOFC performance is resulted from both functional electrolyte and electrode materials.
Titulo: Innovative low temperature SOFCs and advanced materials

Sentencas: The electrolytes are two phase composite materials based on the oxygen ion and proton conducting phases, or two rare-earth oxides.
Titulo: Innovative low temperature SOFCs and advanced materials

Sentencas: The electrodes used were based on the same composite material system having excellent compatibility with the electrolyte.
Titulo: Innovative low temperature SOFCs and advanced materials

Sentencas: They are highly catalytic and conductive thus creating the excellent performances at low temperatures.
Titulo: Innovative low temperature SOFCs and advanced materials

Sentencas: These innovative LT materials and LTSOFC technologies would open the door for wide applications, not only for stationary but also for mobile power sources.
Titulo: Innovative low temperature SOFCs and advanced materials
